news.title: These 2 Mag 7 Members Just Broke All Time Highs
news.content: A few of the beloved Mag 7 members have recently hit fresh all-time highs, extending recent momentum. Do they have more gas left in the tank?

news.title: Elon Musk, Vivek Ramaswamy Slam SEC: 'Just Another Weaponized Institution' - Coinbase Glb  ( NASDAQ:COIN )
news.content: Entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy, who will lead a new "Department of Government Efficiency" in Donald Trump's administration joined Tesla CEO Elon Musk in sharply criticizing the SEC following a federal court decision.

news.title: Cathie Wood's ARKK gets a 30% Trump bump, but outflows persist and top $3 billion in 2024
news.content: Wood's flagship Ark Innovation ETF (ARKK) has surged more than 30% since Election Day, but the fund is still suffering from investor outflows.

news.title: Netflix Adjusts Parental Leave Policy, But There Is A Catch - Netflix  ( NASDAQ:NFLX )
news.content: Netflix Inc. NFLX is revisiting its parental leave policy, which offered unlimited time off during an employee's first year of parenthood. However, mounting challenges in maintaining the policy have led to internal adjustments and confusion about its application, raising employee concerns, the ...

news.title: Rivian, Tesla Will Drive Autonomous Vehicle Progress In 2025: Goldman Sachs - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
news.content: Goldman Sachs says it expects Rivian to monetize its Autonomy+ platform. Goldman Sachs maintains a Neutral rating on Tesla stock and raises its price target from $250 to $345. Get Monthly Picks of Market's Fastest Movers
